website_summaries.verdict: This gas-run model gives you extra power and doesn't tether you to an extension cord.
pros: Pull start is not difficult to use
Not as heavy as you might expect for a gas powered yard tool
cons: The vacuum attachment on this model can be a little difficult to attach

customer_reviews.title: The Remington Ambush Moves a LOT of Air.
customer_reviews.text: This Remington blower is great machine. The air velocity isn't quite as strong as the Ryobi blower I replaced, but the volume of air it moves is substantially more. This is like hurricane in your hand. This machine is also one of the few that can be used as a vacuum. That is important to me. I dinged it a star for two reasons. First, it is a bit heavy. Second, it is more difficult to start than the Ryobi was. The Ryobi always started on the fourth pull, but the Remington takes about a dozen to wake up.
customer_reviews.author: L. Van

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: The leaf vac ran for about 5 minutes and then the engine seized. The website has no information except a phone #. The phone # gets you to a recording that I can't understand. I finally got a phone number in my town but when I called it, they told me they didn't do warrenty work. Thanks Remington.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck R.

customer_reviews.title: Remington Ambush Gas Leaf blower.....LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have never bought a Remington product before but after reading the reviews I decided to try this one. I love it. It starts easily, is powerful and not heavy. I especially like that it uses gas and not a power cord and have found a lot of ways to use it since I can go anywhere with it, even on the roof. I would definitely recommend this product and even recently purchased a Remington "weed eater" because of such a positive experience with the leaf blower. Remington has a You Tube channel that has great information on their products.
customer_reviews.author: sgrace820

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum is terrible, however very easy starting, surely recoil start.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the sole purpose of vacuuming leaves and any debris that maybe in them. The vacuum failed miserably for that. I had to take them into a pile and then it slowly sucked them up. However it soon jammed. Just seems like to large of a feed tube for so little power. I did however like how easy this starts and runs. But that's about the only good thing.
customer_reviews.author: adam6979

customer_reviews.title: Such a great leaf blower!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this based on the reviews. It was delivered quickly and extremely simple to put together. My 14 year old son and I have no issues starting it whatsoever every time and it's very powerful. I use it to clear my driveway/brick paver patio of leaves, sticks, etc. and it's wonderful. I cannot think of one complaint for this item.
customer_reviews.author: preciousad

customer_reviews.title: I like this blower
customer_reviews.text: I just received this blower and so far it is working great. It is surprisingly easy to start and has ample power for leaf blowing. I had purchased 2 Poulan blowers this year and neither one will start so I thought I would try this Remington. It has not disappointed. Like other reviewers I like the right side exhaust. The weight is a little heavier that I like but, hey, at least it runs, unlike my two poulan’s. I would recommend this blower for leaf blowing and lighter around the house chores such as blowing out gutters.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: SUPER MACHINE!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this new tool. It seems to start easily and is very powerful considering the displacement. In desperation, I even used it to clear the dust bunnies clogging the Refrigerator coils that I could not get to the Shop-Vac - then spent an hour vacuuming up the kitchen but the Fridge started running again! Even used it to clear snow off the car -- Oh yah, sometimes I use it to blow leaves since it works well at that job, too. I'm thinking of buying a Remington Chain Saw next.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Bieri

customer_reviews.title: A Real Bargain at the Amazon Price! ... and A Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I've seen the same and similar Remington blowers at retail / home improvement stores and the Amazon price was better than the store sales prices. Additionally, I have had great experience with this blower -- starts after just two to three pulls, even when cold. Best Bang for The Buck I've gotten with a gas blower!
customer_reviews.author: EBG87

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT UNIT FOR ANYONE WHO NEEDS A HAND HELD BLOWER
customer_reviews.text: Have used this unit several times since receiving it and it starts remarkable easy as the instructions said it would. This unit has ample blowing force for a hand held unit. The main reason that I purchased the unit is the design that has the blower suction intake on the right side of the machine and this keeps my trouser pant legs from being sucked against the unit since I hold it in my right hand. All other makes that I looked at do not offer this feature. I am well satisfied with this unit and believe it is a great value for anyone!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brand new. Cord won’t recoil after 3 pulls. Won’t start.
customer_reviews.text: Well... I can’t say much about the product because I never got to use it. The recoil on the starter rope wouldn’t recoil after 3 pulls, so I could never get it started. BUT! Kudos to amazon they’re sending a replacement. As far as the product itself - not the best look when you get an item out of the box and it breaks. If the replacement does the same I’ll take my money elsewhere. Can’t say I recommend this product but maybe I just got a bad apple...
customer_reviews.author: joey hambleton

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product!
customer_reviews.text: This blower is an absolute piece of garbage. Purchased a first one and didn’t get one season out of it. Foolishly, we purchased another thinking it was a fluke and again didn’t get a season out f it when it died. The price was cheap because it’s a piece of crap. Save your money and find another mfr!
customer_reviews.author: joan deroche

customer_reviews.title: Did not work.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad experience: used item once and it was very difficult to start. Tried to start again and cord would not fully retract. The pull cord was somehow jammed. Would not purchase again. Amazon agreed to return item.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G

customer_reviews.title: Works great an easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband for Christmas. It is so light weight my five year old grandson can operate it nicely. Versatile. Blows grass an leaves an dries motorcycles after washing. Works great an easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect !!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced a 10 year old homelite blower, and omg, what a difference, so much lighter to hold, and soooo much stronger of a blower. Starts on 2nd pull every time, love this purchase :-)
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth T. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Great blower!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early. Fully assembled except for installing the blower tube. It’s in 2 pieces and goes together easily. No tools required! Has 2 stroke oil for 1 gallon, 3.2 ounce , 40-1 ratio. I already had my gas oil mix jug ready so I gassed it up. Followed instructions and it fired up quicker than it stated. 5th pull. Ran the entire tank out and very pleased with performance. Light weight too!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: 2 Years still great
customer_reviews.text: Been running this blower for two years. Starts right up every time and gets the job done. Does everything that I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Bawden

customer_reviews.title: Worked a couple of times
customer_reviews.text: Purchased Fall 2019, used a couple of times and put away until this Spring. Got it all prepped for use after the winter. First use this Spring and it kept dying picking up leaves so I couldn't use, second use fired up and I was able to blow off the driveway, just tried it again and it will not even start up. Waste of money for three or four uses. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: No Problems Here
customer_reviews.text: This blower replaces an electric that died, so the weight and vibration caught me by surprise. I only use it to blow grass debris after mowing, so my use is extremely light residential. Followed the directions and it started right up. It's nice to not have to deal with extension cords anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Powerful leaf blower works great
customer_reviews.text: I like that I can take it out of the box and start it right up it comes with a fuel mixture package four poles and it started right up blows very well on Full Throttle it wants to take off on its own lots of air blow your garage out driveway and sidewalk
customer_reviews.author: T. Stade

customer_reviews.title: right out of the box this machine would not start.
customer_reviews.text: this might be a good machine ... i don't know because it would not start. i'm sending it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great in the fall and also winter to get the hard to reach spots of my Jeep cleared of snow.
customer_reviews.author: nowufny2

customer_reviews.title: Blower
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband and he just loves it. It is light weight but has the power he needs. It is much quieter than his last one as well.
customer_reviews.author: MG

customer_reviews.title: Operates as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Starts easily / Operates as expected / After 15 minutes unit feels heavy / Inlet on right side a plus for right handed persons
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: Nice blower
customer_reviews.text: Runs great. It has lots of power and lite weight. It is a little hard to use in the left hand. The air intake is on the right side. Your pants may block intake. I would not buy it if left handed.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This is the “third Remington” blower I have had they all work great 👍👍👍
customer_reviews.author: Eddie W

customer_reviews.title: Overall it's a nice unit.
customer_reviews.text: I like the light weight of the chassis. The blower has a lot of power, and is easy to get started up. I find the mulcher is a little cumbersome but is usable. I mostly keep it in blower mode, and use my lawn mower for any mulching needs.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: This item works very well, I am very impressed ...
customer_reviews.text: This item works very well, I am very impressed with this. I will continue to buy Remington products for my yard work.
customer_reviews.author: aaron

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Ok, replaced my $300 broken blower with this guy and man, what a work horse. Beyond value!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I bought this. This is a major pain in the a** to start. The instructions and steps are ridiculous. Don't waste your money...
customer_reviews.author: Donald F. Lessnau

customer_reviews.title: Easy to start and quite powerful
customer_reviews.text: Easy to start and quite powerful. Air intake on right side so it does not suck in my pants for a right-handed person!!
customer_reviews.author: R. Charles

customer_reviews.title: Vacuum attachments
customer_reviews.text: Hooking up vacuum accessories is difficult. Do not like at all Vacuum and velocity are great. In future designs make the vacuum attachments simple to hook up.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, I cleaned up my whole yard of leaves (6 large trash bags) in about an hour using the vacuum/ mulching feature.
customer_reviews.author: Mccordda

customer_reviews.title: Blow in the wind !
customer_reviews.text: This item was very easy to setup and use ! We had no problem to get it started !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love it works great, not hard to start if you follow directions. Has a lot of power I would highly recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I used for one year was great and strong but now it’s not working anymore low quality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feel like t need to start it with the left hand
customer_reviews.text: I am right handed but prefer the normal way blowers are built with the fan on the left side. This one seems slightly awkward to start. Feel like t need to start it with the left hand.
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Good Value Buy
customer_reviews.text: Powerful yet compact. Is easy to start and operate. Wasn't the cheapest or the most expensive. Does its job and does it well.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Great additional to your tools
customer_reviews.text: We were skeptical because we had one before (different brand) that didn’t work well at all, but this run beautifully and gets the job done fantastically
customer_reviews.author: Haven

customer_reviews.title: Good quality vacuum
customer_reviews.text: Easy enough to use but takes a long time to pick up a big pile of leaves.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Erkmann

customer_reviews.title: Starts very easily runs well
customer_reviews.text: Unit runs very well. Easy to start. Does a good job
customer_reviews.author: david shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: a good product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Use it right now for vacuuming leaves. It works very well
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Machine
customer_reviews.text: Follow the diections and you will have a super machine. My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Marla Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Really blows, in a good way, and does the job nicely :)
customer_reviews.author: Tony EvilDeals

customer_reviews.title: just like my Remington chainsaw
customer_reviews.text: Only lasted one season, just like my Remington chainsaw. This seems to be a throw away brand.
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Extremely poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this brand new. I have attempted to use it three times, however it will not start, spits sparks and smells like gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Easy start & very powerful
customer_reviews.text: Have had a few leaf blowers in my days but would have to say this one is the BEST! Starts easy, lightweight, and very powerful compared to battery or electric versions!
customer_reviews.author: Gilbert Brinkman

customer_reviews.title: Vendor sent in a timely manner and is a great product.
customer_reviews.text: really blows well. Vendor sent in a timely manner and is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: cathy mitchem

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Powerful. no issues. works well with leaves and grass clippings
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not a powerhouse, but runs good
customer_reviews.text: This unit is not a powerhouse, but does start and run good. Air flow is sufficient.
customer_reviews.author: R. Weigel

customer_reviews.title: Should have had this last fall
customer_reviews.text: Not as heavy as I expected and starts up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: It is a blower & vac which is vert helpful for my application
customer_reviews.text: The connection of the vac pipe could be a better design.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Marks

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Blower works great, the vacuum is ok but don't expect too much.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Remington leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Great leaf blower, it cranks easily, and I plan to use it all year.
customer_reviews.author: charles m

customer_reviews.title: It's an awesome blower. I would highly recommend it to anyone
customer_reviews.text: It's an awesome blower . I would highly recommend it to anyone .
customer_reviews.author: emmykiki

customer_reviews.title: so good. It starts easily
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good. It starts easily, has plenty of power, and seems to run cool.
customer_reviews.author: maccallme

customer_reviews.title: no help to get repair
customer_reviews.text: not worth the money hard to start broke in 11 months can not get any help to repair
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Problems with this Blower/Vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Take note, I could not return this item to a third party seller - once gas is put in any device they sell it can not be returned due to shipping regulations. That being said, this Remington product is only useful as a relatively decent blower. The vacuum part is completely ineffective - clogs immediately with any volume of leaves, bag is flimsy, and it fills up fast. Additional problems: the air filter cover falls off every time it's used and the air tubes that fasten together leak at the seam. Recommend buying these types of products from a store that accepts returns.
customer_reviews.author: Will V

customer_reviews.title: Good for the right person
customer_reviews.text: Extremely light for this size blower , very easy to start. MPH and CFM over exaggerated (once you read specs in manual). If you're over 5ft 5" this is not the blower for you, as the tube is way too short and you'll be the Hunchback of Notre Dame after even a small project. Thankfully I saved my old tube and attached with set screws or unit wiould be unusable for me. For 10cts to manufacture tube longer it would receive a 5plus star rating, but I'm 6ft 1" and can only give it an honest 3 stars. After my conversion it does a FABULOUS job.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product, ezy to put together and started right up. Use it once this year and looks like it's under powered (requiters multiple cleaning of intake pipe: even dry lives are getting stock). Will try it next year again
customer_reviews.author: Edward Zhitnitsky

customer_reviews.title: Very easy start and light in weight
customer_reviews.text: Very easy start and light in weight. The start pull was so light that I jammed it and screwed it up. However for the use that I needed it I decided to get another one. Just don't go ape on the start pull.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Zeiske

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, well-reviewed, but it is weak!
customer_reviews.text: Good price, fired up immediately - but if you expect to blow even a moderate amount of leaves, you should consider a different option. It sounds like a toy while it is running, the pipe is too short and this contributes to this unit's inability to perform well. I bought this unit to use in my offhand as I run a backpack blower as well (yes I use two blowers, its effective and I have a lot of leaves to blow). It is practically useless if they leaves you are blowing are not PERFECTLY dry and crispy. I will finish out Fall with it, but will give it away next year and purchase a different unit.
customer_reviews.author: Scroto T. Baggins

customer_reviews.title: not a good unit
customer_reviews.text: Hard to start, takes a long time to warm up to use. called for service was given three places to try none would look at the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Syden

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great first use. Plenty of power even at high altitude area. Easy to start.
customer_reviews.author: Obieone

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a hurricane but a pretty strong Gail force wind. Fast shipping and easy starting.
customer_reviews.author: lance

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $140
customer_reviews.text: Wish i Can return. Won’t start it anymore, going to check with amazon what I can do besides throwing it in trash. Waste of $140. Primer bulb and gas lines needed replacement working again
customer_reviews.author: Nenad Andelkovic

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Great blower. Love the intake on the other side. Starting is a bit tricky but it starts Everytime.
customer_reviews.author: jesse s.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it works wonderful and has tons of air to move dirt debris leaves and snow!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: worked well and easy start. will recommend to
customer_reviews.text: as advertised. worked well and easy start. will recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Pat Romero

customer_reviews.title: So heavy
customer_reviews.text: This blower is SO heavy. I’m 5’2” and about 130 so I’m no big guy but I’m no whimp. I can’t believe how heavy this thing is. My arms hurt after about 3 minutes. The power is ok, but I have to have the throttle pretty high and then I reek of gas. Wouldn’t recommend. Sucks cause it can’t be returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality blower for the buck...
customer_reviews.text: Remington (MTD) continues not to disappoint. Bought this as the mate to the Remington Rustler string trimmer I had purchased 04/20/16. This has the 27cc with the trimmer the 25cc. Not much difference I can see? Blower is simple and straight forward. 40:1 mix (just like the trimmer) which I prefer to the 50:1 that most blowers I looked at featured. At this price point I am guessing they are all very similar. I did not require a vacuum feature. Trigger lock is a nice feature. Is it as good as a Stihl BG86; no but it is also 90 bucks less.
customer_reviews.author: flipflopkitties

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: Blower works great. I am always concerned with starting 2-cycle engines. The directions said to pull ten times when cold. Mine started the 3rd pull, and has been starting quickly ever since. Lots of power, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: GPM

customer_reviews.title: ... only used it for blowing leaves it did a good job and it started with no problems
customer_reviews.text: I have only used it for blowing leaves it did a good job and it started with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: fernando hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Works great as a blower and leaf shredder. Not easy to change into the lead bagger but after a few times went smoothly. Light weight
customer_reviews.author: moneer

product_meta.title: Remington RM2BV Ambush 27cc 2-Cycle Gas Leaf Blower with Vacuum Accessory - Handheld Gasoline Leaf Blower for Lawn Care, Orange
product_meta.description: Style:With Vac AccessoryBlast and bag with one versatile leaf blower and vacuum all in one. The Remington RM2BV Ambush is designed to corral, vacuum, and bag leaves and debris with ease and efficiency. The Ambush's 205 mph gas powered air speed and 450 cfm air volume corners yard clutter and its 16-to-1 debris reduction. Talk about speed and efficiency. This leaf blower and vacuum is equipped with QuickStart technology, which makes starting the blower easy and effortless. The variable throttle with cruise control provides greater control for the user. The Ambush's extended nozzle reaches the ground for easy operation without bending. This two in one leaf blower with vacuum accessory will allow you to take care of lawn care projects in no time. The Remington RM2BV is backed by a 2-year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: 2-IN-1 BLOWER VACUUM: Great for blowing and vacuuming up debris during lawn care, yard work, and other projects that require clean up!
2-CYCLE GAS ENGINE: High velocity engine moves air at 205 mph in volumes up to 450 cfm displacing larger debris more effectively and increasing efficiency. Do more in less time.
10-to-1 DEBRIS REDUCTION RATIO: Vacuum significantly reduces the size of leaves and other debris meaning the bag requires less frequent emptying and waste will be more compact for disposal.
QUICKSTART TECHNOLOGY: Spring-assisted coil reduces the effort required to pull start the machine allowing you to get to work right away.
CRUISE CONTROL: Variable throttle with cruise control allows the operator to choose the force of the airstream and let the throttle finger rest.
COMFORTABLE HANDLE: Over mold handle absorbs and reduces vibration giving you maximum control and comfortability when you need it the most.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars197 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
